reviewText:
"Deck the Halls" is a 2007 American Christmas comedy starring Matthew Broderick, Danny DeVito, Kristin Davis and Kristin Chenoweth. Optometrist Steve Finch is ready to celebrate Christmas with his family, but he forgot about one thing his new neighbors. He meets Buddy Hall (DeVito) and the two later find themselves competing with each other over Christmas. Buddy is determined to make his house visible from outer space even if it is at Steve's discretion. From things like an out of control sleigh ride, a burning Christmas tree lot and fireworks the rivalry gets out of hand and they both forget the true meaning of Christmas.
This film is packed with non-stop hilarious antics and is sure to be a Christmas classic from years to come
